I'm a Cloud Engineer, IT Support Official, and Community Engineer who currently works as an IT Support Specialist at [Shivtech Limited](https://shivtech.net.ng). I'm passionate about sharing knowledge, documentation, cloud engineering, Jamstack, AWS content, and others. I create technical content (on my [Blog](https://dev.to/ikoh_sylva), [Newsletter](https://dev.to/ikoh_sylva), and [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/ikoh.silver)), build useful [open-source projects](https://github.com/007gregious), speak at some local meetups/conferences, build technical communities...

**Here's a quick summary about me**:

- üòä Pronouns: He/Him
- üí° Fun fact: I'm currently studying at AltSchool Africa [School of Engineering](https://altschoolafrica.com/schools/engineering) Class of Tinyuka 2024.
- üå± I‚Äôm currently learning HTML, CSS, Javascript, and other necessary skills in the cloud stacks.
- üòä I‚Äôm looking for help with open source projects, hackathons, internships, and entry-level opportunities.
- üíº Job interests: Cloud Engineer, Cloud Security Engineer, or Cloud Support Engineer (Intern or Junior level).
- üì´ You can [view my portfolio](#) and contact me by emailing [Sylvanus Ikoh](mailto007gregious@gmail.com).
